languages.text: "Я редко задумывалась о том, какую цену платят темные кузены, чтобы сберечь свои души от лап Той, Что Жаждет. Зато теперь я вижу, какую цену платят их жертвы. Какую цену заплатили мои братья".

traits.locale_text: "Я редко задумывалась о том, какую цену платят темные кузены, чтобы сберечь свои души от лап Той, Что Жаждет. Зато теперь я вижу, какую цену платят их жертвы. Какую цену заплатили мои братья".

languages.text: "I have rarely given a thought to the price our dark kin pay to save their souls from the clutches of She Who Thirsts. But now I see the price their victims pay. The price my kin have paid."
languages.original_text: "Я редко задумывалась о том, какую цену платят темные кузены, чтобы сберечь свои души от лап Той, Что Жаждет. Зато теперь я вижу, какую цену платят их жертвы. Какую цену заплатили мои братья".

traits.locale_text: "I have rarely given a thought to the price our dark cousins pay to save their souls from the clutches of Her Who Thirsts. But now I see the price their victims pay. The price my brothers have paid."
"I have rarely given a thought to the price our dark cousins pay to save their souls from the clutches of Her Who Thirsts. But now I see the price their victims pay. The price my brothers have paid."
"I have rarely given a thought to the price our dark kin pay to save their souls from the clutches of She Who Thirsts. But now I see the price their victims pay. The price my kin have paid."
"I have rarely given a thought to the price our dark kin pay to save their souls from the clutches of She Who Thirsts. But now I see the price their victims pay. The price my kin have paid."
"I have rarely given a thought to the price our dark kin pay to save their souls from the clutches of She Who Thirsts. But now I see the price their victims pay. The price my kin have paid."

languages.text: «No suelo pensar en el precio que pagan nuestros siniestros parientes por salvar sus almas de las garras de la Sedienta. Pero ahora veo el precio que pagan sus víctimas. El precio que han pagado mis congéneres».
languages.original_text: "I have rarely given a thought to the price our dark kin pay to save their souls from the clutches of She Who Thirsts. But now I see the price their victims pay. The price my kin have paid."

traits.locale_text: «No suelo pensar en el precio que pagan nuestros siniestros parientes por salvar sus almas de las garras de la Sedienta. Pero ahora veo el precio que pagan sus víctimas. El precio que han pagado mis congéneres».

languages.text: 「かの渇きたる女の支配から自分らの魂を救うために、我が闇の血族が払う代償について、ほとんど考えたことはなかった。だが今は、彼らの犠牲者たちが払う代償を見た。それは我が血族が払った代償だ」
languages.original_text: "I have rarely given a thought to the price our dark kin pay to save their souls from the clutches of She Who Thirsts. But now I see the price their victims pay. The price my kin have paid."

traits.locale_text: 「かの渇きたる女の支配から自分らの魂を救うために、我が闇の血族が払う代償について、ほとんど考えたことはなかった。だが今は、彼らの犠牲者たちが払う代償を見た。それは我が血族が払った代償だ」

languages.text: “我很少想过，我们的黑暗表亲为了从饥渴女士的魔爪下拯救自己的灵魂，愿意付出怎么样的代价。不过，我现在能看到他们的受害者和我的族人为了他们的目的付出了怎样的代价。”
languages.original_text: "I have rarely given a thought to the price our dark kin pay to save their souls from the clutches of She Who Thirsts. But now I see the price their victims pay. The price my kin have paid."

traits.locale_text: “我很少想过，我们的黑暗表亲为了从饥渴女士的魔爪下拯救自己的灵魂，愿意付出怎么样的代价。不过，我现在能看到他们的受害者和我的族人为了他们的目的付出了怎样的代价。”

languages.text: « Je n'ai que rarement songé au prix payé par nos sombres cousins pour sauver leurs âmes des griffes de l'Assoiffée. Mais je vois désormais le prix que paient leurs victimes. Le prix qu'ont payé mes semblables. »
languages.original_text: "I have rarely given a thought to the price our dark kin pay to save their souls from the clutches of She Who Thirsts. But now I see the price their victims pay. The price my kin have paid."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai que rarement songé au prix payé par nos sombres cousins pour sauver leurs âmes des griffes de l'Assoiffée. Mais je vois désormais le prix que paient leurs victimes. Le prix qu'ont payé mes semblables. »

languages.text: "Ich habe selten über den Preis nachgedacht, den unser dunkles Volk zahlt, um seine Seelen aus den Fängen von Ihr, die dürstet, zu retten. Aber jetzt kenne ich den Preis, den ihre Opfer zahlen. Der Preis, den meine Art zahlen musste."
languages.original_text: "I have rarely given a thought to the price our dark kin pay to save their souls from the clutches of She Who Thirsts. But now I see the price their victims pay. The price my kin have paid."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe selten über den Preis nachgedacht, den unser dunkles Volk zahlt, um seine Seelen aus den Fängen von Ihr, die dürstet, zu retten. Aber jetzt kenne ich den Preis, den ihre Opfer zahlen. Der Preis, den meine Art zahlen musste."

languages.text: "Kara soydaşlarımın, ruhlarını Susayan'ın pençelerinden kurtarmak için ödedikleri bedeli pek düşünmezdim. Şimdiyse kurbanların, soydaşlarımın ödediği bedeli görebiliyorum."
languages.original_text: "I have rarely given a thought to the price our dark kin pay to save their souls from the clutches of She Who Thirsts. But now I see the price their victims pay. The price my kin have paid."

traits.locale_text: "Kara soydaşlarımın ruhlarını Susayan'ın pençelerinden kurtarmak için ödedikleri bedel, nadiren düşüncelerimde yer eder. Şimdiyse kurbanlarının ödedikleri bedeli görebiliyorum. Soydaşlarımın ödediği bedel..."
